snippet.title: The Ghosts of Blackwood Manor [TRAILER/GAMEPLAY]
snippet.description:
The Ghosts of Blackwood Manor is an Infocom style interactive fiction game by award-winning adventure author Stefan Vogt. Step into an immersive world of 1980s gothic horror, where nothing is as it seems and your very actions will impact the outcome of your gloomy journey. Will you solve the mystery? 

Available on [ 8bitgames.itch.io/ghosts ]

for Commodore 64, ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, Commodore Amiga, Atari ST, MS-DOS, BBC Micro, Plus/4 and many more popular home computer systems from 1980s. 

RELEASE: 2nd of December 2023


---
Music by Playsound from Pixabay
